t = int(raw_input());
for i in range(t):
	n = int(raw_input());	
	a = map(int,raw_input().split());
	d = map(int,raw_input().split());
	max = 0;
	count = 0;
	time = 0.5;
	while time < 1000:
		for j in range(n):
			if (a[j] < time and time < d[j]):
				count+=1;

		if (max < count):
			max = count;
		count = 0;
		time+=1;
	print max;
